item.title: Episode Two: Burnout

item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Side Quest Completed, the gamedev hobby podcast! Listen Now MP3 OGG Topics Recent project updates Burnout over the years Combatting burnout The cycle of lack-of-energy and building habits back
item.description:
Welcome to Side Quest Completed, the gamedev hobby podcast!

Listen Now

MP3 OGG

Topics

  • Recent project updates
  • Burnout over the years
  • Combatting burnout
  • The cycle of lack-of-energy and building habits back

item.title: Episode One: The Journey Begins
item.itunes:author: Side Quest Completed
item.itunes:summary: Welcome to Side Quest Completed, the gamedev hobby podcast! Listen Now MP3 OGG Topics Letting go of projects Games that aren't puzzles but can be described as puzzles Working a collection of games as a game Time boxing drawings to get over artist's block Prepping for a new job, balancing …
item.description:
Welcome to Side Quest Completed, the gamedev hobby podcast!

Listen Now

MP3 OGG

Topics

  • Letting go of projects
  • Games that aren't puzzles but can be described as puzzles
  • Working a collection of games as a game
  • Time boxing drawings to get over artist's block
  • Prepping for a new job, balancing …
